ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/Alexofp/BDCC
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Text based game about being a prisoner in a space prison with a lot of adult themes. Working title is Broken Dreams Correctional Center or BDCC for short. Test the latest version here: (could be unstable)

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/HungryProton/scatter
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Godot engine addon to randomly fill an area with props or other scenes

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/Maaack/Godot-Game-Template
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Godot template with a main menu, options menus, pause menu, credits, scene loader, extra tools, and an example game scene.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/Orama-Interactive/Pixelorama
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Unleash your creativity with Pixelorama, a powerful and accessible open-source pixel art multitool. Whether you want to create sprites, tiles, animations, or just express yourself in the language of pixel art, this software will realize your pixel-perfect dreams with a vast toolbox of features. Available on Windows, Linux, macOS and the Web!

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/Phazorknight/Cogito
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Immersive Sim Template Project for GODOT 4

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/dreadpon/godot_spatial_gardener
ns0:entry.ns0:content: A Godot plugin for painting plants and props on arbitrary 3D surfaces implemented in GDScript
